name: Apocalypse Raid -- Zombies
description: This is a prototype. I am just seeing if people like the idea. If this was the real game the description would be like this: You wake up at your base camp to find all of your members dead/'zombified' and you have very little supply's left. Invade other bases to collect supply's and get to the end of the 'road'. I hope you like playing. Thanks!
